archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This collection consists of a letter from Payne to Walter S. Newman, VPI President (1947-1962), a letter from Newman to Miss Elizabeth Woolwine in the library, and a completed questionnaire regarding VAMC in the 1870s and 1880s.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Charles K. Payne Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Charles K. Payne Papers, 1949, Ms1949-003 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Charles K. Payne Papers were donated to Special Collections in 1949.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Charles K. Payne Papers commenced and was completed in 1949. Additional description was completed in April 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Charles K. Payne was a student at the Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College from 1875-1886. He was also a member of the Kappa Sigma Kappa fraternity.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a questionnaire filled out by Payne, regarding his experience at VAMC. Two related letters, one from Payne to VPI President Newman accompanying the form, and one from Newman to Miss Elizabeth Woolwine in the library.

did.unittitle: Questionnaire; letter to President Newman; letter from Newman to Miss Woolwine, 1949.
